original: intros net Hreach h p e t li pli plt es lc Hbody Hin_p Hin_e. unfold raft_intermediate_reachable in Hreach. induction Hreach. - exfalso. inversion Hin_p. - specialize (rri (AppendEntries t li pli plt es lc) p net Hbody Hin_p). destruct rri as [_ Hrefined]. apply candidate_entries_lowered_nw'. + apply candidate_entries_lowered_rvr'. all: auto. + apply votes_correct_interface; auto. + apply cronies_correct_interface; auto. - apply IHraft_intermediate_reachable. auto. - contradiction.
